snippet: A House panel is looking into claims that Representative Steve Stockman took illegal contributions from two staff members and may have made false statements in a bid to cover it up.
abstract: House Ethics Committee opens investigation into Republican Rep Steve Stockman of Texas over accusations that he took illegal contributions from two of his staff members and may have made false statements in an effort at coverup; Stockman lost recent bid for Senate seat.
lead_paragraph: A House panel is looking into claims that Representative Steve Stockman took illegal contributions from two staff members and may have made false statements in a bid to cover it up.

headline.main: Texas Lawmaker Investigated Over Campaign Donations
